abstract: Google announced a suite of Web analysis products that it will offer to marketers who want more insight into how well their digital ads are performing.
snippet: Google announced a suite of Web analysis products that it will offer to marketers who want more insight into how well their digital ads are performing.
lead_paragraph: For advertisers, doing business on the Web is all about quantifying the clicks and impressions their ads generate. On Wednesday, Google hopes to expand that by announcing a suite of Web analysis products that it will offer to marketers who want more insight into how well their ads are performing.
